title: Leading 20 U.S. brands 2018 , by brand value
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 20 number of Brands.
Brand Amazon has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Nike has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Brand is 155484.0.
